name: Non-Disclosure Agreement (IP-Specific)
description: Mutual or unilateral NDA for protecting confidential information during IP discussions

requiredFields.name: Agreement Type
requiredFields.description: Is this a mutual or one-way NDA?

requiredFields.name: Disclosing Party
requiredFields.description: Full legal name of the party disclosing confidential information

requiredFields.name: Receiving Party
requiredFields.description: Full legal name of the party receiving confidential information

requiredFields.name: Purpose of Disclosure
requiredFields.description: Specific purpose for sharing confidential information (e.g., 'evaluating potential patent licensing opportunity')

requiredFields.name: Effective Date
requiredFields.description: Date when the agreement becomes effective

requiredFields.name: Term (Years)
requiredFields.description: How many years will the NDA remain in effect?

requiredFields.name: Include IP Ownership Provisions
requiredFields.description: Include clauses about intellectual property ownership?

requiredFields.name: Governing State
requiredFields.description: Which state's laws will govern this agreement?

sections.title: Parties
sections.content: This {{#if mutual}}Mutual {{/if}}Non-Disclosure Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of {{date effective_date "MMMM DD, YYYY"}} ("Effective Date") by and between {{disclosing_party}} ("{{#if mutual}}First Party{{else}}Disclosing Party{{/if}}") and {{receiving_party}} ("{{#if mutual}}Second Party{{else}}Receiving Party{{/if}}"){{#if mutual}}, collectively referred to as the "Parties" and individually as a "Party"{{/if}}.

sections.title: Recitals
Confidential Information

prompts.system: You are an experienced IP attorney drafting an NDA. Focus on comprehensive but clear definitions.
prompts.user: Enhance the confidential information definition based on the purpose: {{purpose}}. Add any industry-specific examples that would be relevant.

sections.title: Obligations
Intellectual Property Provisions
sections.content:
Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed as granting any rights, by license or otherwise, to any Confidential Information or any intellectual property rights of {{#if mutual}}a Party{{else}}{{disclosing_party}}{{/if}}, except as expressly set forth herein.

{{#if mutual}}Each Party{{else}}{{receiving_party}}{{/if}} acknowledges that all right, title, and interest in and to any developments, enhancements, or derivatives of the Confidential Information shall remain with the {{#if mutual}}disclosing Party{{else}}{{disclosing_party}}{{/if}}.

No reverse engineering, disassembly, or decompilation of any prototypes, software, or other tangible objects that embody Confidential Information and are provided hereunder is permitted.

sections.title: Term
sections.content: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for {{term_years}} year{{#if term_years > 1}}s{{/if}}, unless earlier terminated by either party upon thirty (30) days' written notice. The obligations of confidentiality shall survive termination of this Agreement for a period of {{term_years}} year{{#if term_years > 1}}s{{/if}}.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of {{governing_state}}, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
